bibl.title: 'What Remains behind': Hellenism and Romanitas in Christian Egypt after the Arab Conquest.
bibl.note: Early versions of this article were presented at the Eighth International Congress of Coptic Studies (Paris, 2004) and at the Medieval Studies Research Seminar (University of St Andrew, 2005).

bibl.title: From Hellenism to Islam. Cultural and Linguistic Change in the Roman Near East

bibl.seg: PAPACONSTANTINOU Arietta, 'What Remains behind': Hellenism and Romanitas in Christian Egypt after the Arab Conquest.
Hannah M. COTTON, Robert G. HOYLAND, Jonathan J. PRICE and David J. WASSERSTEIN (Edd.), From Hellenism to Islam. Cultural and Linguistic Change in the Roman Near East (Cambridge, 2009) pp. 447-466.
Early versions of this article were presented at the Eighth International Congress of Coptic Studies (Paris, 2004) and at the Medieval Studies Research Seminar (University of St Andrew, 2005).
